channel.title: Business Unit Separation on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Business Unit Separation on FinanClub

item.title: BABA
item.description: score:45 Chances: Alibaba’s update to Alipay’s international interface to support overseas travelers and facilitate credit card purchases could enhance user experience and drive growth. Separating the DingTalk office communication platform from the cloud division might be a strategic move that unlocks value for Alibaba’s business units.
